attributes.action: desist from unilaterally changing the GP contract, an action that was supposed to have occurred only in the event of a national emergency.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government is activating plans to unilaterally change the GP contract which were supposed to be used only in national emergency. They are doing so purely to override negotiated change. The credibility of government in negotiated contracts is at stake here.
